_field_real.name: recharge duration:seconds#amount of time it takes to fully charge energy from empty
recharge delay:seconds#time that elapses after last ability use before recharging begins

_field_custom.name: recharge base duration:seconds#amount of time it takes to fully charge energy from empty

_field_struct.name: recharge base duration:seconds#amount of time it takes to fully charge energy from empty

item.Name: sequential#applies the percentages one after another on the base
total percentage#adds up all of the percentages and applies them to the base
addition#adds on all of the modifiers to the base
product#multiplies the values one after another on to the base

_field_custom.name: activation energy cost scalar#scales how much energy activating any ability that requires energy to activate consumes

item.Name: sequential#applies the percentages one after another on the base

_field_tag_reference_64.name: ability activation failure effect#effect played when an ability wants to activate but fails to do so (usually due to inadequate energy)
overheat effect#effects triggered when thrusters overheat
cooldown effect#effects triggered when thrusters cooldown

_field_real.name: energy bar row#the screen is divided up into a grid like structure such that if you use integral numbers for the row and column you can easily space multiple energy bars.
energy bar column#the screen is divided up into a grid like structure such that if you use integral numbers for the row and column you can easily space multiple energy bars.

_field_real_fraction.name: energy bar warning pct:[0,1]#energy bar pct at which we notify player they can't perform action.
